price: 10. Waxaan ka cabsan Rabbigayo (Allaah) Maalin (wajigu) doorsoomi, murugo badan.
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
